sentences.en: An elegant and beautiful embroider shoe still discovered all round female cadaver.
sentences.cn: 女尸四周还发现了一只精美漂亮的绣花鞋.

sentences.en: Cadavers are used to teach med students surgical skills and anatomy.
sentences.cn: 尸体是教授医学院学生外科手术技术和解剖用的。

sentences.en: Despite himself he looked down again at the gaping mouth of the cadaver.
sentences.cn: 他的眼光不由自主地又落到了死人张大的嘴上.

sentences.en: I've got a piece of a cadaver in there a replacement.
sentences.cn: 我有一张一具尸体在那里作为替代.

sentences.en: My face looks like a cadaver equally ghastly!
sentences.cn: 我的脸看起来像个死尸一样惨白!

sentences.en: Objective : To study the appearance of the cadaver temporomandibular joint ( TMJ ) discs under confining indentation.
sentences.cn: 目的: 研究离体环境下人体颞下颌关节盘的抗力表现.

sentences.en: Objective To investigate the methods for the procuring of donor liver cadaver.
sentences.cn: 目的探讨心脏停搏供体肝脏切取与修整的方法.

sentences.en: Results: No antiseptic was used when the cadaver was encoffined, neither used in the coffin liquid.
sentences.cn: 结果: 殓葬时未使用任何防腐剂, 棺液也无防腐和固定作用.

sentences.en: So you're suggesting we get donor skin from a human cadaver?
sentences.cn: 那你是在建议我们从一具尸体上取下可移植的皮肤?
研究设计: 尸体研究.

sentences.en: The cadaver was intended for dissection.
The main drawback of cadaver skin application is the transmission of infections.
sentences.cn: 应用尸体异体皮的主要缺点是疾病的传染.

sentences.en: This model has been validated with the cadaver test results.
sentences.cn: 根据已有的尸体实验结果,验证了模型的可靠性.

sentences.en: Two cadaver knees were imaged with a 1.5 T MR system.
sentences.cn: 方法:选择尸体膝关节2只,检查设备为Marconieclipse1.5TMR扫描仪.

trans.tran_en: a dead human body, especially one used for study
